```{r setup, include=FALSE}
source("setup.R")
load(file.path("data-raw", "geneIDs.rda"))
```

```{r header, child="header.Rmd"}
```



```{r cherrypick}
cherrypick <- file.path("data-raw", "cherrypick.xlsx") %>%
    read_excel %>%
    mutate(clone = paste0(library,
                          plateNum,
                          plateRow,
                          str_pad(plateCol, 2, pad = "0"))) %>%
    filter(!is.na(sequence)) %>%
    select(clone, sequence) %>%
    arrange(clone) %>%
    left_join(geneIDs[, c("gene", "sequence")], by = "sequence")
glimpse(cherrypick)
saveDataRaw(cherrypick)
```
